name: Hidden Object Strange Mystery Mysterious Place
name_original: Hidden Object Strange Mystery Mysterious Place
description:
Help Keightley escape this old, mysterious house in this hidden object adventure!

Enjoy the narrated storyline as you trek through this long abandoned house. Rummage through the hundreds of items left behind by the previous owners and make your way through the derelict manse. Find the differences between scenes and discover the secret paths that run through the empty home. While your challenges may vary, one thing remains clear: Help Keightley escape this Mysterious Place!

FEATURES
-Great hidden object and spot the difference game play!
-Hundreds of items to find, dozens of differences to discover!
-A great narrative through the abandoned home, driven by the main character Keightley.
-Great for ages 6 and up!
